sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { removeProductFromCart } from '../features/cartSlice' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' const CardTemplate = ({product}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { id, productName, productVersion, productPrice} = product if ( productName, productVersion, productPrice) return 'loading' return (
{productName}
{`${productPrice}/- Rs`}
dispatch(removeProductFromCart(id))}/>
) } export default CardTemplate
